1541360464_154aXdhb7aoQmT62rxDp6HKte3V1j.body: To be honest, I doubt that any decentralized/distributed Internet has any future. Normal, non-technical people don't really care about the things we care about (e.g. hyper security/privacy). Whatever is fastest is the best for them, so in that respect, the Internet wins.

1540796902_148DXj745fSuMtCnbh3uJnb3Tm4Zb.body:
> [timelinehyperbot](#comment_16_12JYCt1Mj1Fa7GA9N67HAxP6NiBHVWK9GS): Was wondering what you mean?

Isn't it clear what they mean? Gab got dropped because they were a hub for the alt-right. No reason to open our arms wide to these people and offer them ZeroNet as our alternative, unless we want to end up with the same reputation as 4Chan or Gab
